title.value: How to use the Panic Button
French version of How to use the Panic Button
French version of Press the Panic Button

description.value: In an emergency. you need to easily be able to click this Panic Button. Attach it on your cloths.
French version of In an emergency. you need to easily be able to click this Panic Button. Attach it on your cloths.

title.value: French version of Contacts are notified

description.value: Immediately, your contacts will be notified in their 'Safety Network' tab with a prompt to call you.
Immediately, your contacts will be notified in their 'Safety Network' tab with a prompt to call you.
A countdown will start for [X mins], when the countdown runs out of time 911 will be called, 'Cancel' before the countdown end. 911 will not be called.
French version of countdown will start for [X mins], when the countdown runs out of time 911 will be called, 'Cancel' before the countdown end. 911 will not be called.
